20110118150603.000|20110118150604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: -- WOULDN'T ANSWER

20110118150617.000|20110118150622.000|CC1|OF CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS.      
20110118150622.000|20110118150622.000|CC1|DOCTORS HERE SAY THE            
20110118150622.000|20110118150624.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN MAY HAVE EVEN     
20110118150624.000|20110118150625.000|CC1|TRIED TO SMILE AT HER HUSBAND,

20110118150942.000|20110118150944.000|CC1|THE HEART PUMP THAT SAVED HIS

20110118150957.000|20110118151000.000|CC1|WE HAVE THAT KIND OF TECHNOLOGY.
20110118151000.000|20110118151001.000|CC1|>> Reporter: I KNOW YOU'RE NOT

20110118151005.000|20110118151006.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.

20110118151012.000|20110118151014.000|CC1|AND THEN TWO BATTERIES, ONE ON  
20110118151014.000|20110118151016.000|CC1|EACH SIDE, GOOD FOR ABOUT 12

20110118151212.000|20110118151213.000|CC1|TERROR SURVEILLANCE PROGRAM.

20110118151230.000|20110118151233.000|CC1|SO I THINK HE'S LEARNED FROM

20110118151234.000|20110118151234.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LET'S TALK ABOUT   
20110118151234.000|20110118151236.000|CC1|THE TRAGIC SHOOTING IN TUCSON.  
20110118151236.000|20110118151238.000|CC1|>> WELL, I FIRST HEARD THE NEWS 
20110118151238.000|20110118151240.000|CC1|AND I WAS SHOCKED, I THINK LIKE 
20110118151240.000|20110118151242.000|CC1|EVERYBODY ELSE.                 
20110118151242.000|20110118151244.000|CC1|I THOUGHT THE PRESIDENT HANDLED 
20110118151244.000|20110118151245.000|CC1|IT WELL.                        
20110118151245.000|20110118151247.000|CC1|I'M NOT AN OBAMA SUPPORTER BY   
20110118151247.000|20110118151250.000|CC1|NATURE, BUT I THOUGHT THIS WAS  
20110118151250.000|20110118151251.000|CC1|ONE OF HIS BETTER EFFORTS.      
20110118151251.000|20110118151253.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE DON'T KNOW WHAT 
20110118151253.000|20110118151255.000|CC1|MOTIVATED THIS YOUNG MAN, BUT   
20110118151255.000|20110118151257.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY THERE WAS AN UPROAR 
20110118151257.000|20110118151300.000|CC1|ABOUT CONTENTIOUS POLITICAL     
20110118151300.000|20110118151302.000|CC1|RHETORIC BEING RESPONSIBLE.     
20110118151302.000|20110118151304.000|CC1|>> I THINK WE HAVE TO BE A      
20110118151304.000|20110118151308.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT CAREFUL HERE ABOUT A 
20110118151308.000|20110118151311.000|CC1|RUSH TO JUDGMENT ABOUT ASSUMING 
20110118151311.000|20110118151313.000|CC1|THAT SOMEHOW THE REST OF SOCIETY
20110118151313.000|20110118151319.000|CC1|OR THE POLITICAL CLASS BEARS THE
20110118151319.000|20110118151320.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY FOR WHAT HAPPENED

20110118151322.000|20110118151323.000|CC1|DERANGED, CRAZED INDIVIDUAL THAT
20110118151323.000|20110118151326.000|CC1|COMMITTED THE CRIME.            
20110118151326.000|20110118151328.000|CC1|I THINK, YOU KNOW, OUR POLITICS 
20110118151328.000|20110118151330.000|CC1|CAN GET PRETTY ROUGH AT TIMES.  
20110118151330.000|20110118151332.000|CC1|HAVING BEEN VICE PRESIDENT FOR  
20110118151332.000|20110118151335.000|CC1|EIGHT YEARS, MAYBE I'M MORE     
20110118151335.000|20110118151337.000|CC1|SENSITIVE TO IT THAN OTHERS.    
20110118151337.000|20110118151340.000|CC1|BUT THE FACT OF THE MATTER IS,  
20110118151340.000|20110118151342.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, GOOD POLITICAL FIGHTS 
20110118151342.000|20110118151344.000|CC1|IS ONE OF THE GREAT STRENGTHS OF
20110118151344.000|20110118151346.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRACY.                  
20110118151346.000|20110118151348.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOWEVER, CHENEY    
20110118151348.000|20110118151349.000|CC1|SIDE-STEPPED GETTING INTO THE
